formElement.documentation: Identifies the job. Use either the job name and job ID combination or the job correlator to identify the job.
formElement.label: Jobname:

formElement.documentation: Identifies the job. Use either the job name and job ID combination or the job correlator to identify the job.
formElement.label: Jobid:

formElement.documentation: Identifies the job. Use either the job name and job ID combination or the job correlator to identify the job. To use a job correlator on this request, specify the full job correlator for the job: The 31-byte system portion, a semicolon, and the user portion (up to 32 bytes). The correlator can be one that you have obtained from the "job-correlator" property in a returned JSON job document.
formElement.label: Correlator:

formElement.documentation: This param tells to procedure to wait until the status of the job is changed in set param. Checks are being done every 10 seconds. Timing out(if parameter is set) will push this procedure to fail.
formElement.label: Wait for the Job Status:

formElement.documentation: Timeout in seconds. If procedure works or awaits more then Timeout, then it will fail.
formElement.label: Timeout:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Property sheet name or filename for results:
